description: This module requires kalite 0.16 or higher, and rachelpios from 2016.04 or later. You must run manually enable spanish in kalite, and run the install.sh script after downloading.
prereq_note: It only works with kalite 0.16+ and rachelpiOS greater than v201604 - it also requires manually installing the Spanish content pack and running install.sh
title: KA Lite es
